snippet.title: Hyper Flex Trailer
snippet.description:
Ever wanted to play VVVVVV, Pivvot, Super Hexagon and Impossible Game at the same time? No? Anyway, it doesn't matter, because now you can!
Change gravity, dodge obstacles and reach 1000 meters on each level to reveal The Mystery! You have to know what's hiding behind those question marks, right? 

I'm sorry, Terry.

Android: [WILL BE BACK SOON]
Windows: http://gamejolt.com/games/hyper-flex/126888

Get OST here: https://trackedmusic.bandcamp.com/album/hyper-flex-ost-001

Also, you can follow me in Twitter
http://twitter.com/chaifoxes
and VK
http://vk.com/chaifoxes
